properties.MonoWasmSdkPath: Path to the `sdks` directory in a Mono build. Sets MonoWasmFrameworkPath, MonoWasmTargetsPath and MonoWasmRuntimePath.
properties.MonoWasmFrameworkPath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly framework assemblies.
properties.MonoWasmTargetsPath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly build targets.
properties.MonoWasmRuntimePath: Overrides the path to the Mono WebAssembly runtime libraries.
